author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed a bug that prevented circular refernce errors from being printed.
2) Changed a bunch of code from URL to ParsedURL.
3) Fixed a bug with empty text in flows.
4) Fixed how lineMetrics are generated in SVGGVTFont.

author: vhardy
msg: Contribution from Nicolas Socheleau (nicolas.socheleau@bitflash.com). Added support for dynamic modification of <text> elements' x,y,dx,dy attributes as well as dynamic insertion/removal of <tspan>, <tref>, <textPath>, CDATA and Text node children.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed a bug where elements without update handlers would cause an exception
2) Fixed an off by one bug in GlyphIterator.

author: hillion
msg: Implemented some new SVG DOM methods.
